trustfund:
TF051880-PHRD-PHILIPPINES: SECOND
            WOMEN'S HEALTH AND SAFE MOTHERHOOD PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Second Women's
            Health and Safe Motherwood (WHSM) is to encourage behavior
            change by pregnant women to have facility-based deliveries
            by skilled birth attendants. A combination of
            performance-based grants formed part of new government
            strategies to strengthen WHSM for disadvantaged women.
            Government of The Philippines (GOP) is giving high priority
            to WHSM services because of: 1) relatively high and stagnant
            maternal mortality ratio of 162/100,000 live births; 2)
            women having one more child than intended, on average; 3)
            the high population growth rate of 2.3 percent; and 4) poor
            access to WHSM services by disadvantaged women.
